item.title: Understand One Sentence as a Software Developer
item.description: You don’t get paid to write code It’s a sentence, that is very obvious to many. However, truly understanding and following this mentality changes your work completely. You don't get paid to write code, you get paid to develop a product. As software developers we love to write code and try new things. We want to play with technology. It’s fun. It’s creative. It’s exciting. Specifically, when a lot of people start using our code.

item.title: Become a Better Programmer
item.description: Don’t waste your time on tutorials and courses, instead focus on your projects

item.title: 1k Thank You
item.description: Just a quick thank you and hello world in Hugo

item.title: Author
item.description: Hello my name is Richard Schwabe, I make videos on youtube and other mediums. I like to share my knowledge about anything related to Software Development. On this very casual blog I will write some extra infos, behind the scenes and also provide more infos for the videos I publish. If you want to get in touch or checkout other pages of mine checkout my linktree
